page.title: 03COMMUNICATIONS _ EVENJOBB
page.content: THE POSTMAN REACHES THE VILLAGE BETWEEN 1O.OO A.M. AND 11.OO A.M. DELIVERING MAIL TO EVERY HOME AND COLLECTING OUTGOING MAIL. POST BOXES ARE EVENJOBB AND KINNERTON, 2ND COLLECTION IS 3.15 P.M. _ 3.3O P.M.NEWSPAPERS ARE DELIVERED TO THE VILLAGE; DAILY & WEEKLY LOCAL PAPERS FEATURING EVENTS & ADVERTISEMENTS. BOTH PARISHES HAVE MAGAZINES WHICH THEY SHARE WITH OTHER PARISHES IN THEIR GROUPS, THESE MAGAZINES LIST LOCAL EVENTS, NEWS, AND ARTICLES FROM THE CHURCHES. RADIO IS ENJOYED BY ALL, LOCAL STATIONS BEING RADIO WALES AND RADIO WYVERN.TELEVISION RECEPTION HAS IMPROVED SINCE THE LOCAL TRANSMITTER WAS OPENED ON EVENJOBB HILL. SOME HOMES RECEIVE WELSH T.V. BUT MOST WATCH MIDLANDS & CENTRAL T.V.TELEPHONE KIOSKS ARE IN BOTH VILLAGES,MOST HOMES HAVE 'PHONES.C.B.RADIO IS POPULAR.
